entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 257,468Chapters: 56/100Kudos: 2,674

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: Lessons in pleasure
entry.summary:
Author: Ace_Teagirl

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,580Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 157

Summary: “One of my girls mentioned she saw a new face at the market today. A pretty boy looking for employment. I have a proposition for you, if you want to accompany me inside,” the woman said.Her voice was warm and her smile almost motherly. It made Merlin ache for the comfort of his home. He looked at her uncertainly. Merlin may have had a sheltered upbringing in his small farming village, but he could imagine what kind of work she had to offer him, and he wasn’t sure he wanted it. Still, he stood up, shaking slightly from hunger and exhaustion. There was something in this woman’s eyes that compelled Merlin to trust her.

entry.title: The Kitchen Boy's Secret
entry.summary:
Author: The_green_fairy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,548Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 75

Summary: Merlin has spent six months invisible in Camelot's kitchens, taking on extra work to avoid the other servants who sense something different about him. He hides his magic carefully in a world where it's scorned, hoping kindness will win him acceptance. Then Arthur's servant mistakes him for one of the king's harem boys. What begins as a humiliating mix-up becomes something neither of them expected. Arthur can't forget his pretty kitchen boy—the virgin who talked with him until dawn.

entry.title: Destiny Unfold
entry.summary:
Author: chronic_pain_in_the_ass

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,235Chapters: 5/65Kudos: 51

Summary: No young man, no matter how great, or mystic can know his destiny. He cannot glimpse his part in the great story that is about to unfold. Like everyone, he must live and learn. And so, it will be for the young magic arriving at the gates of Camelot. A boy that will, in time, father the legend. His name: Merlin.OrA rewrite of Merlin if the writers weren’t cowards. A lot gayer, magic users aren’t the enemy in every single episode, and Uther is the actual villain of the story. Morgana is still a villain, but we have sympathy for her.

entry.title: I Want to Make You My Problem
entry.summary:
Author: applezest

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,254Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 4

Summary: In which Merlin is a theatre usher and Arthur is a new security guard. Merlin has been an usher at Camelot Theatre in the West End ever since he moved to London to live with his godfather Gaius. Now the theatre is under the new management of Uther Pendragon, who appears to have brought his entire family on its payroll. The new head of security operations and security guard Arthur is annoying, bossy, and much too stiff. But Merlin makes his peace, since he has to put up with him for almost every show from now on. You know the rest.

entry.title: Beyond the Castle Walls
entry.summary:
Author: paladinstormblessed

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,517Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 5

Summary: "Welcome to the Unknown, boys." The man looms over them, his dark outline filling Arthur's vision, and his booming voice fills his ears. The felled tree next to them howls in anguish, leaves blowing through the hollow axe-strikes to form teeth. "You're more lost than you realize." or, Arthur Pendragon, eleven years old and the Prince of Camelot, finds himself lost in the middle of a dark forest. His only companion is an odd, quiet boy who seems to wish he was far, far away from him. The two must find a way home, even if it means resorting to the use of sorcery. But perhaps sorcery is much closer to him than he realizes.

entry.title: Losing or gaining control (is sometimes closer to each other than you think)
entry.summary:
Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 174,866Chapters: 41/58Kudos: 148

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. But deep friendships, trust, loyalty and love bring them ever closer to their goal.Will Merlin find the control he needs and can Arthur forget his past to open his heart?

entry.title: Different Destiny: The Outlaw Prince
entry.summary:
Author: tansyuduri

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,592Chapters: 4/25Kudos: 54

Summary: When Merlin's magic is exposed shortly before season 2 starts, the path of destiny starts changing forever. Now on the run with Arthur, Morgana, and Gwen. Merlin hopes to convince Arthur that magic is totally good instead of him and Morgana just being an exception. Morgana, meanwhile, hopes to convince him to usurp his father. As allies are gathered and Arthur realizes the injustice in his kingdom, it looks more and more like he will have to act in a drastic way. A way he dreads.   Meanwhile, Arthur and Merlin are growing closer and closer and might just have feelings for each other. Something they probably should be better about realizing, considering the example of Gwen and Morgana right next to them.   In a land of myth and a time of magic, the destiny of a great kingdom now rests on the shoulders of four, their names: Merlin, Arthur, Guinevere, and Morgana

entry.title: Deliver Us From Evil
entry.summary:
Author: Bookbitch3457

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,212Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 27

Summary: Arthur Pendragon has spent his whole life trying to be good. The pastor’s son in a town where every mistake is a sin. He knows what his father says about weakness — about men who love the wrong way, about hearts that stray from the Lord’s path. He’s heard the sermons, felt the fear settle into his bones like scripture. But then a boy walks into church one Sunday.A boy with dark hair, blue eyes, and a look in him that says he’s never been afraid of God. And Arthur, who’s spent eighteen years praying for salvation, finds himself wondering what it might feel like to fall instead.

entry.title: is it all we've ever been?
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,147Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 14

Summary: And, at the very center of Merlin’s attention, was the one who must be his soulmate, the very cause of this color. This was the moment he had been waiting for. Arthur would choose him, he had to. There was no universe where he wouldn’t fall for Merlin. It was inevitable; they fit together too perfectly for it to end any other way. But, god, he wanted it so badly.Or; Merlin longs to be with Arthur, his soulmate, so desperately that he’d do anything to stay in his life. But Arthur already has a soulmate, and the thought consumes Merlin, haunting him with the cruel truth that he was too late for the one love that was meant to be his.

entry.title: The Trial of Uther Pendragon
entry.summary:
Author: HerMajestyofLichtenstein

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,262Chapters: 38/?Kudos: 1,416

Summary: When Morgana invokes a long forgotten spell, the ancient and powerful Court of Magic is summoned to pass judgment on Uther Pendragon and his bloodline for their crimes against the magical world. But for the verdict to be carried out, every seat on the Council must be filled, and the chair of the Dragonlords has long stood empty. Now Merlin faces an impossible choice: side with his people and end Uther’s reign of terror, or save Arthur.

entry.title: Threads of Destiny
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,632Chapters: 9/18Kudos: 43

Summary: Soulmate AU where Merlin and Arthur discover their marks react violently the moment they meet, forcing them to confront destiny while hiding Merlin’s magic. As danger, prophecy, and growing attachment collide, they must decide whether the bond will save them—or destroy them.

entry.title: No matter what happens
entry.summary:
Author: Eez_fan_works

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,166Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 1,181

Summary: “If you so much as touch us, Emrys will-“ Merlin's heart nearly stops.“Emrys?” The king cuts off in turn, confusion in his voice.“He’s only the embodiment of magic, last of the dragon lords, and is the most powerful warlock that has ever roamed the earth.” There is only silence as the girl's words hang in the air.OrMerlin saves two children from execution during a trial and plans to help them escape. No matter what happens.
